channel.title: Error while running server
channel.description:
when i try to run my server i get this:
Hodgeyscape Is online on port 43594 - To change this message go into server.java and search for 'hodgeyscape is online' and change it..-Jayden Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "3 200 962 2 20" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2035) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:547) at server.main(server.java:110)
can anybody help me with what to do?

item.title: Error while running server
item.dc:creator: @mage_pwns mage pwns
item.description:
@mage_pwns wrote:

ahhh thanks i think i know where[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 13, 2009, 11:33:00 am[/size][hr]thanks a lot

item.title: Error while running server
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

in one of your config files you recently changed you over spaced somthing. always use tabs instead of spaces!

item.title: Error while running server

item.description:
@mage_pwns wrote:

when i try to run my server i get this:

Hodgeyscape Is online on port 43594 - To change this message go into server.java
and search for ‘hodgeyscape is online’ and change it…-Jayden
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “3
200 962 2 20”

can anybody help me with what to do?
